query: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.state, c.address, c.existing_solar, p.id as proposal_id, p.status, p.title, p.created_at FROM customers c LEFT JOIN proposals p ON p.customer_id = c.id WHERE c.name LIKE '%Theochari%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2p3K1dfddpGHimM.570595ac1fed --database P6CTqT8eNBMi3wEqmJdcEm --execute SELECT c.id, c.name, c.state, c.address, c.existing_solar, p.id as proposal_id, p.status, p.title, p.created_at FROM customers c LEFT JOIN proposals p ON p.customer_id = c.id WHERE c.name LIKE '%Theochari%';
